    • Method Detail

      • shouldDefer

        protected boolean shouldDefer(Aggregator aggregator)
        Description copied from class: AggregatorBase
        This method should be overidden by subclasses that want to defer calculation of a child aggregation until a first pass is complete and a set of buckets has been pruned. Deferring collection will require the recording of all doc/bucketIds from the first pass and then the sub class should call AggregatorBase.runDeferredCollections(long...) for the selected set of buckets that survive the pruning.
        Overrides:
        shouldDefer in class AggregatorBase
        Parameters:
        aggregator - the child aggregator
        Returns:
        true if the aggregator should be deferred until a first pass at collection has completed
